title: Spaghetti Carbonara
summary: A classic Italian pasta dish with eggs, cheese, bacon, and black pepper.
instructions: Cook the pasta. In a separate bowl, mix eggs and cheese. Fry bacon until crispy. Combine everything and season with pepper and salt.

title: Chicken Tikka Masala
summary: Chunks of grilled chicken cooked in a creamy tomato gravy.
instructions: Marinate chicken in yogurt and spices. Grill or pan-fry. Prepare a sauce with tomatoes and cream. Combine and simmer.
